ModMetaData.name: Additional Joy Objects Lite (Unofficial)
ModMetaData.author: cuproPanda, updated by Ben
ModMetaData.description: Adds new objects and activities which bring joy to colonists, but not books. The mod is originally by cuproPanda and has been maintained by dninenmfive. I've updated AJO-Lite to 1.1 with permission from dninemfive.
